error_instance.title_placeholder: Oh, in the meadow a red viburnum...
error_instance.content_placeholder: ...has bent down low. For some reason, our glorious Ukraine has been worried so...
error_instance.max_width_popover: Sets the maximum total width of the final image, including borders. The content area will be scaled down to fit within this limit.
error_instance.icon_id_popover: Each style has its own set of icons. Use the picker button to see all available icons and their IDs for the selected style.
error_instance.cross_enabled_popover: Determines whether the close button (cross) in the window's title bar is rendered as active or disabled.
error_instance.alignment_popover: Controls the horizontal alignment of the entire button block. The 'Auto' option uses the default alignment defined by the selected style, while other options force a specific layout.
error_instance.autosort_popover: When enabled, buttons are automatically arranged based on their type in an order predefined by the style (e.g., Recommended, then Default, then Disabled). Disable this to allow manual drag-and-drop sorting.

button_dialog.mnemonic_popover: When enabled, draws an underline under the first character of the button's text to indicate it as a hotkey.

preview_panel.no_preview_batch: Batch mode: Preview is not available

about_dialog.title: Winerr.NET WebUI
about_dialog.description: A powerful web-based editor for Winerr.NET.

server_down.title: Server Unavailable
server_down.description: Could not connect to the Winerr.NET server. The application cannot function without it. Please ensure the server is running and accessible.

toasts.session_restored_desc: Your previous work has been loaded.
toasts.import_fail_desc: The selected file is either not a valid JSON or has an incorrect structure.
toasts.copy_unsupported_desc: Your browser might not support this feature.
